title: Homepage
quote: If you are looking for a career in international education or student recruitment, The PIE is the place. Job postings are relevant and current. I applied for three jobs and was invited for interviews for two of them, which led me to my current job. All happened within a few weeks. Thank you for connecting me! I am also very pleased with the content of the news section, which keeps me updated on the market and the competitive situation. I highly recommend The PIE to other industry professionals. Mickey Kromann-Jensen, new Regional Manager (East Asia) – Queen’s University Belfast/INTO Queen’s University Belfast, Northern Ireland, UK
